sentences: Kiireloomuline töö ei võimaldanud hetkelistki seisu.
Autojuht andis seisult gaasi ja sööstis paigast.
context: The Estonian word 'seis' has multiple meanings depending on context. It can refer to a physical position or state (like a standing posture), the current status of something (financial, political, etc.), or a momentary pause in activity. In sports contexts, it can mean score or position in a game.
